Title: The Little Comedian
Writer: Aummaraporn Phandintong, Mez Tharatorn, Witthaya Thongyooyong
Actors: Chawin Likitjareonpong, Paula Taylor, Jaturong Mokjok, Nichapat Charurattanawaree
Plot: Tock, heir to a long line of comedians has a problem. He is not funny. Constantly upstage by his younger sister, he falls in love with a dermatologist who incidentally is the only one who finds him funny.
